source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_00<tab>Edgyth is looking bereft of confidence as usual.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_00<tab>グリーングラブ菜園のエドギスは、冒険者に結果を報告したいようだ。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_01<tab>You find Edgyth looking rather more down in the dumps than usual. The reason for her mood soon becomes apparent, as she explains that the entire first generation of crossbred popotoes has recently withered. The two of you prepare to head to Gridania in order to consult Fufucha regarding this unforeseen predicament.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_01<tab>エドギスによると、品種改良の第一世代が枯死したらしい。そのことで、フフチャから話があるそうだ。グリダニアの園芸師ギルドにいる「フフチャ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_02<tab>Speaking with Fufucha, you learn that even the guild's botanists have been stumped by Edgyth's problems. As no one else is seemingly capable of getting to the root of the issue, Fufucha asks for you to examine the plants with a fresh pair of eyes. You set off on the trip back to Idyllshire with your new mission in mind.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_02<tab>フフチャと話した。園芸師ギルドでも枯死の原因がわからなかったので、冒険者も調べてほしいと頼まれた。イディルシャイアのグリーングラブ菜園にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA47501 /var>」を調べよう。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_03<tab>Upon examining the Mudplots' fields, you notice a strange white speck amongst the plant life. You decide this calls for further inspection and go in closer for a second look.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA47501 /var>を調べた。グリーングラブ菜園の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA47501 /var>」を再度調べよう。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_04<tab>Your hunch proves well founded as you discover a chalky stone. Unable to discern exactly what it could be, you elect to hand it over to Edgyth.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CF601 /var>を手に入れた。グリーングラブ菜園の「エドギス」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CF601 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_05<tab>Edgyth seems to have worked out the stone's identity, before immediately doubting herself, as she is wont to do. You talk some sense to her and, after regaining her composure, she bids you head to Stickqix's Bangpots in order to have Goldwox there create a reagent. Edgyth says this holds the key to identifying the blight affecting the popotoes.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_05<tab>エドギスに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CF601 /var>を渡した。彼女は何かに気がついたらしく、原因を確定させるための試薬の発注を冒険者に頼んだ。イディルシャイアのスティックキクス工房にいる「ゴルドオクス」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CF701 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_06<tab>You hand Edgyth's order to Goldwox. The goblin girl informs you that while she can make the reagent you require, she first needs you to bring her twenty clumps of nanoriso. You prepare to embark on a long journey to the Rasen Kaikyo by the Ruby Sea in search of this exotic plant.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_06<tab>ゴルドオクスに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CF701 /var>を渡した。<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CF801 /var>を作るには、材料が足りないらしい。スティックキクス工房の「ゴルドオクス」に「<var 28 ((Item)) F2461B01 /var>」を20個納品しよう。「<var 28 ((Item)) F2461B01 /var>」は紅玉海の螺旋海峡にある草刈場で草刈できる。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_07<tab>You return to the Bangpots, weary from your travels, and furnish Goldwox with her requested nanoriso. She is at last able to synthesize a reagent for you, which you gladly accept. The object you came for in hand, you begin the trip back to Greengrub Mudplots, hoping to finally solve the mystery behind the problematic popotoes.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_07<tab>ゴルドオクスに<var 28 ((Item)) F2461B01 /var>を納品し、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CF801 /var>を作ってもらった。グリーングラブ菜園の「エドギス」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CF801 /var>」を渡そう。

source:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_08After applying the reagent, it becomes apparent the menace that has laid waste to the popotoes is none other than an eelworm. The stones you discovered were in fact the creature's eggs, which Sawney theorizes hatched in the Mudplots fairly recently. Upon learning all of this, Fufucha asks for some time to allow her to invent a plan to tackle the eelworm threat.

※The next botanist quest will be available from Edgyth upon reaching level 70.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SEQ_08エドギスにを渡した。それを使って確認したところ、第一世代の枯死の原因は、ネマトーダという虫によるものだとわかった。フフチャらが対応策を探している間、冒険者は何が起きてもいいように園芸師の技術を磨いておこう。

※園芸師のレベルが70以上になると、イディルシャイアのグリーングラブ菜園にいるエドギスから次の園芸師クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Fufucha in Gridania.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_TODO_00<tab>園芸師ギルドのフフチャと話す

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_TODO_01<tab>Investigate the specified location in Idyllshire.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_TODO_01<tab>イディルシャイアの<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA47501 /var>を調べる

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_TODO_02<tab>Investigate the plot once more.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA47501 /var>を再度調べる

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_TODO_03<tab>Present the chalky stone to Edgyth.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_TODO_03<tab>エドギスに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CF601 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_TODO_04<tab>Present Edgyth's order to Goldwox.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_TODO_04<tab>ゴルドオクスに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CF701 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_TODO_05<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Harvest nanoriso by the Rasen Kaikyo)) ((Deliver the nanoriso to Goldwox in Idyllshire)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_TODO_05<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((螺旋海峡で<var 28 ((Item)) F2461B01 /var>を草刈)) ((イディルシャイアのゴルドオクスに<var 28 ((Item)) F2461B01 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_TODO_06<tab>Deliver the reagent to Edgyth.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_TODO_06<tab>エドギスに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CF801 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I don't imagine you were expecting good news, considering my involvement, but I have once again managed to make a mess of everything.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_000……あ、冒険者さん。
すみません、ダメダメなウチのせいで、
残念な結果を伝えなきゃいけません……。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_001<tab>While the first generation of crossbred popoto plants successfully sprouted, every single one of them withered frightfully fast. I imagine it's down to some kind of disease, but an amateur such as myself could never hope to identify such a thing.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_001交雑で作りだした改良ポポトの第一世代ですが、
発芽はしたものの、すぐに枯れてしまったんです。
何らかの病害だと思うのですが……。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_002<tab>Fufucha has once again summoned us to the guild to discuss this latest development. I shall see you there.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_002今後について「フフチャ」様から話があるとのことなので、
冒険者さんも、一緒に話を聞いてもらえませんか？
よろしくお願いします……。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_003<tab>Nice to see you again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I don't know why you're talking with me when Fufucha is right there... <sigh>
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_003来てくれてありがとうございます、冒険者さん。
それじゃあ、一緒に「フフチャ」様の話を聞いてください……。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_010<tab>Welcome back from your journey to the Far East, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I assume Edgyth has already informed you of our worrying predicament?
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_010よく来てくれました、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
第一世代の枯死については聞きましたね？
その解決について、あなたの力をお借りしたいのです。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_011<tab>I hypothesize that our first generation of crossbred popotoes have inherited the Walker's unfortunate vulnerability to both diseases and pests. However, we are yet to pinpoint the exact cause as to why they have wilted so quickly.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_011おそらく、メークインポポトの病気や害虫に弱いという形質が、
第一世代に遺伝したのだと思いますが、直接の原因は不明……。
まずは、問題を洗い出すところから始めねばなりません。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_012<tab>B-But how can that be!? Was no one at the guild able to determine the cause of our plight?
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_012そんな！？
フフチャ様でも……グリダニアの誇る園芸師ギルドでも！
枯死の原因がわからないというのですか！？

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_013<tab>Much as it vexes me, this conundrum has bested all of us. We at the guild are fundamentally nothing more than observers of nature. It is a force all of its own, one that we try our best to understand, but cannot hope to harness─nor should we.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_013ええ……残念ながら。
私たちも、自然の恵みを与る者でしかなく、
悔しくはありますが、すべてがわかるわけではありません。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_014<tab>However, that is not to say that all is lost. I fully intend to devote all of the resources available to me in order to ascertain exactly what it is that hinders our progress so.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_014ですが、解決を諦めたわけではありませんよ。
原因を究明するべく、引き続き調査を行いましょう。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_015<tab>I was also hoping I could count on your help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. A fresh pair of eyes may be exactly what is needed to get to the bottom of this mystery.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_015)) (( )) 02 /var>、あなたも手伝ってください。
さしあたり、菜園の畑を調べてほしいのです。
冒険者ならではの視点で、何か発見できるかもしれませんから。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_016<tab>That's a good idea. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, let's head back to the Mudplots and I shall do my best not to get in your way.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_016あ、う、ウチも戻って、一緒に調べます。
ダメダメなウチじゃ、何もできないと思いますけど……。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_017<tab>There could be any number of reasons as to why the popotoes are so quick to wilt. At the very least, I do not think it is down to any oversight on Edgyth's part. There has to be something that we are yet to discover at the root of this...
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_017植物が枯死する原因はさまざまです。
ですが、管理に不備があったとは思えません。
何か別の、不測の事態によるものとしか……。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_018<tab>I've told Sawney about our popoto problem; he said he'd try looking through Sharlayan records to see if he can find any similar cases. I'm really sorry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'm not quite sure how, but I know this is definitely all my fault.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_018ソーニーさんには、状況を共有して、
シャーレアンの資料を、調べてもらっています。
……ウチがダメダメなせいで、失敗してごめんなさい。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>You spy a faint white glint within the soil.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SYSTEM_000_020土の中に、極小さな白い点が見える……。
もっとよく調べてみよう。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SYSTEM_100_020<tab>Upon closer inspection, you find a chalky stone.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SYSTEM_100_020<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA47501 /var>から、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8CF601 /var>」を見つけた！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_110_020<tab>What is the matter? Was there something in the soil?
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_110_020ぼ、冒険者さん、なにか見つけたんですか！？
すごいです、さすがです！！
……あ、あの、ダメダメなウチにも、見せてもらえませんか？

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_020<tab>Is something the matter, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Don't tell me, you've discovered the problem!?
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_020そ、そのう……よければですね、
ダメダメなウチにも、見つけたものを見せてもらえませんか？

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_021<tab>Is this some kind of...stone? No, that's not right. But surely Fufucha would have noticed this if it were so simple.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_021……これは……石？
いや、違う……そうじゃなくて……。
でもこれを、フフチャ様がわからないはずない……

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_022<tab>Yes, I must be mistaken. There's no way an amateur such as myself could solve something that stumped the guild.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_022……そうです、きっと勘違いです。
ダメダメなウチの考えなんて、
絶対間違ってると思いますし……。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_A1_000_001<tab>Have some bloody confidence in yourself for once!
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_A1_000_001<tab>自分の考えに自信を持て

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_A1_000_002<tab>Even Fufucha doesn't know everything.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_A1_000_002<tab>フフチャだってわからないことがある

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_030<tab>...I think I needed someone to tell me that. And I have to say, I'm glad it came from you. Thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_030冒険者さん……。
ウチ……ダメダメですけど……。
でも、冒険者さんの言葉なら、自信を持ちます！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_040<tab>Now that I think of it, she said exactly the same thing herself, didn't she? Perhaps, by the grace of Nymeia, the fates have aligned to enable me to do something of use for once in my life!
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_040……フフチャ様も、そう言ってましたね。
それなら……何かの奇跡で、ダメダメなウチが、
気がついてしまうことも、あるかもしれなかったり……うん！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_041<tab>Ascertaining the identity of these chalky stones may well be the key to uncovering what's causing our popotoes to wither so quickly. However, we will first require a reagent.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_041もしかしたら、枯死の原因がわかるかもしれません。
ただ、確定させるためにはが必要です。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_042<tab>I know we've already had you do enough work for a lifetime, but would you be able to visit Stickqix's Bangpots for me? Hand this order to an alchemist there named Goldwox and she should be able to give you what we need.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_042冒険者さん、スティックキクス工房の、
「ゴルドオクス」さんにこのメモを渡して、
をもらってきてもらえますか？

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_043<tab>In the meantime, I will head to the guild and ask Fufucha for her expert opinion regarding these stones.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_043ウチはこのを、
フフチャ様とソーニーさんに見せて、相談してきます。
よろしくお願いしますね！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_043<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I must congratulate you and Edgyth on discovering what seems to be the cause of our popoto problem. From what I have heard, I would theorize that...no, I cannot be certain just yet. A botanist needs to be confident in their convictions; it will not do for me to just throw around hypotheses with wild abandon.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_043)) (( )) 02 /var>、お手柄でした。
エドギスさんの話からして、おそらく原因は……。
いえ、これは確定してからお話ししましょう。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_050<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Goldwox recognizes mining uplander. Does uplander not want to trade tongueflaps with Chief Stickqix?
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_050シュコォ……シュコォ……
アンタは　ヒトの　採掘師？
最技研に　ご用でなくて　わざわざゴブに　何のご用？

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_060<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Welcome to Stickqix's Bangpots! What brings uplander here?
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_060シュコォ……シュコォ……
ようこそ　我らが　工房へ！
いったい　ぜんたい　何のご用？

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_070<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Uplander would have Goldwox crafty-make reagent?
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_070シュコォ……シュコォ……
なるほど　なるほど　が　ご入用！
でもでも　いまは　作れない！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_071<tab>First, Goldwox needs uplander to bring seaweed known as nanoriso! Gobbie needs this for reagent.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_071欠かせぬ　素材　とっても希少な　「」
手持ちにないから　作れない！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_072<tab>Bring Goldwox twenty clumps of nanoriso and gobbie will crafty-make the reagent!
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_072アンタは　園芸　できる人？
ならなら　「」　採ってきて！
20個もあれば　　作れるぞ～！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_073<tab>Uplander needs to visit the Far East. Nanoriso can only be found at the bottom of the Ruby Sea!
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_073「」　遠い東の　海藻よ！
紅玉海の　海の底　そこなら　そこそこ　採れるはず～！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_080<tab>Bring Goldwox twenty clumps of nanoriso and gobbie will crafty-make the reagent!
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_080シュコォ……シュコォ……
紅玉海の　「」　20個もあれば
が　作れるぞ～！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_081<tab>Finer nanoriso Goldwox has not seen! Gobbie will start craft-making of reagent right away!
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_081これは　まさしく　「」だ！
品質　良質　これならできる！
ちょっと　待ってね　すぐすぐ　試薬を　作っちゃる！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_100_081<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Goldwox shall use techniques of both uplanders and gobbies to make reagent with fastness.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_100_081シュコォ……シュコォ……
ガリガリ　ゴリゴリ　素材を潰し～
ゴブの技術で　混ぜ混ぜすれば～　あっという間に　できあがり～！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_082<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Reagent is ready for Edgyth!
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_082シュコォ……シュコォ……
ほらほら　完成　「」！
コイツを　「エドギス」　届けてね～！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_083<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Make sure Goldwox's sweatworking doesn't go to waste!
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_GOLDWOX_000_083シュコォ……シュコォ……
ゴブの　力作　「」！
ちゃんと　「エドギス」　届けてね～！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_090<tab>Hello again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Did everything go smoothly at the Bangpots?
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_090冒険者さん、冒険者さん、お待ちしてました！
「」は手に入りましたか？

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_091<tab>Fantastic! Now we can finally see if my silly little hypothesis holds true.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_091さすが、冒険者さん！
これで原因を特定できますよ。
本当にダメダメなウチの考えが正解か……それ！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_100<tab>...I can't believe it. Did I do something wrong? How could something that came from my mind ever turn out to be correct?
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_100やっぱり……反応がでちゃいましたね……
信じられないけど、間違いありません。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_101<tab>I see you two have already begun your tests. Have you discovered anything new?
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_101そろそろ、何かがつかめている頃かと思い、
様子を見にきてみましたが……いかがですか？

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SAWNEY_000_102<tab>Did Edgyth's guess end up bein' correct?
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SAWNEY_000_102シャーレアンの資料にあった「アレ」で、
間違いなかったのか？

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_103<tab>The way it responded to the reagent doesn't leave much room for doubt. It's an eelworm: a pest that is not going to do us any favors. The chalky stone-like object that <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> found was one of its eggs.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_103試薬に反応しましたし、間違いありません。
枯死の原因は、ネマトーダというとても小さな害虫。
冒険者さんが見つけた「」は、その卵です。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_104<tab>So things are just as you assumed they were, Edgyth. There is, however, one issue I still struggle to comprehend. As parasites, eelworms require a host plant to feed on. The Mudplots were only created recently─just why were the eggs of such vermin lurking in the area?
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_104エドギスさんが気がついたとおりでしたか。
ですが、ネマトーダは寄生する宿主がなければ生きられません。
新たに作った菜園に、なぜその卵が……。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_105<tab>According to the Sharlayan records Sawney looked at, eelworm eggs enter a state of dormancy within their mother's corpse, allowing them to survive for over a decade. They're more than capable of waiting for as long as is necessary for new grub to show up.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_105シャーレアンの研究資料によれば、ネマトーダの卵は、
母虫の死骸の中で休眠状態になり、10年以上、耐えるのだとか。
そうして、しぶとく宿主が現れるのを待つそうです。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SAWNEY_000_106<tab>The blasted records also claimed that they'd all been exterminated. Either the Sharlayans have a funny definition of the word, or we were unlucky enough to pick an area that was home to an eelworm corpse or two─the eggs inside which hatched and infested the Mudplots.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SAWNEY_000_106その資料には、すべて駆除済みとあったんだがな。
だが……どこかに卵を抱えた死骸が残っていたんだろうよ。
それが今回の件で、宿主を得て孵化しちまった……。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_107<tab>Most unfortunate indeed. I must say though, I have been remarkably impressed by the tremendous growth you have shown, Edgyth. You have come a long way, both as a person and a botanist.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_107なるほど……。
エドギスさん、あなたはこの地の自然について、
よく学び、よく理解していますね。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_108<tab>I h-have no idea what you are talking about! After all, it was <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> that found the eelworm eggs in the first place, and I still haven't come up with a solution to this pest problem...
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_108そ、そんな……気がついたのは、たまたま、ですし……。
そもそも冒険者さんが、卵を見つけてなければ……。
それにそれに、解決法もまだわからないですし……。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SAWNEY_000_109<tab>The records weren't much use regardin' that either. Although, you'd think they must've had some way of riddin' themselves of the vermin if they were happy considerin' them “exterminated.”
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SAWNEY_000_109資料には、対応策までは書いてなかった。
駆除済みとあるからには、方法があるはずなんだが……。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_110<tab>Well then, I suppose it is time I pulled my weight as well. I shall look into past cases of eelworm infestation and try to formulate a suitable plan of action.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_110では、ここからは私の仕事ですね。
ほかのネマトーダ被害の例を参考にしながら、
最適な対応策を考えてみましょう。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_111<tab>I'll keep looking through the Sharlayan records to see if I can't find a solution as well!
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_EDGYTH_000_111う、ウチは、引き続きシャーレアンの資料を、
調べてみます！
対応策がわかるかもしれませんし！

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SAWNEY_000_112<tab>Suppose I'll give you a hand with that. I may not know much about plants, but my eyes work well enough.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SAWNEY_000_112んじゃ、俺はそれを手伝うか。
それくらいしか、できねえしな。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_113<tab>My apologies, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but you will need to be patient for a while as we search for a permanent solution to this conundrum. Edgyth will let you know once we are ready to put an end to these pests once and for all.
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_FUFUCHA_000_113あなたの出番は、私たちが対応策を見つけた後でしょう。
それまでは今までどおり、冒険の中で、
園芸師の技術と知識を磨いてください……頼りにしてますよ。

source: TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SYSTEM_000_120<tab>In blazing new trails as a botanist, you have learned “Bountiful Harvest II”!
target:
TEXT_CLSHRV680_02623_SYSTEM_000_120園芸師として、ポポトの品種改良への協力を経て、
「バウンティフルハーベストII」を修得しました！
